column4: I'm surprised...there is nothing like teamviewer or crossloop in linux?
But vnc needs to be configured at both ends...These are ppl who need tech support..they don't know much..I was thinking something like just install , run and I can view their screen
you can preconfigure it, so that it connects to a remote server. user doubleclicks an item, and it show your their screen.... might be vnc has to be installed, not just run, cant remember
